about_the_game:
PRESENTATION


This is a classic old-school 2D fantasy RPG.

A terrible disease knowns as the Spread roams freely through the world of Terra. What was once a land of peace and beauty is now a land torn between survival and pain.
Moira and her family are the only survivors of their village, in her attempt to flee the sickness by going to a safe haven, she loses her husband, becoming the sole responsible for her children's safety and life.

There is more tragedy coming her way that she could have ever imagined. Between making even more sacrifices and discovering a way to put an end to the disease while keeping her children alive, Moira will have to become someone far stronger than she thought she could ever be.

FEATURES


  • 10 to 20 hours of gameplay
  • A very free gaming experience
  • Explore the entirety of a world in ruins and discover hidden treasures, enemies and locations
  • Special weapons to be found
  • Optional dungeons to explore
  • Optional bosses to defeat
  • Mouse support
  • Autosave feature
